mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.technology_platform AS "technologyPlatform", a.version AS "version", a.version_num AS "versionNum", a.down_address AS "downAddress", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zmkj_product_config( name, technology_platform, version, version_num, down_address, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{technologyPlatform}, #{version}, #{versionNum}, #{downAddress}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE zmkj_product_config SET name = #{name}, technology_platform = #{technologyPlatform}, version = #{version}, version_num = #{versionNum}, down_address = #{downAddress}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
